text: thm kuly min kuli thamarat tshthynha, fasluki turuq rabik mdhllt lk; litalab alrizq fi aljibal wakhilal alshjr, waqad jaealaha sahlatan elyki, la tdly fi aleawd 'iilayha wa'iin baeudat. yakhruj min butun alnahl easal mukhtalif alalwan min bayad wsfrt whmrt waghayr dhlk, fih shifa' lilnaas min alamrad. 'iina fima ysneh alnahl ladlalt qawiatan ealaa qudrat khalqha liqawm ytfkrwn, fyetbrwn
